RelatedSentence: ABBOTTABAD : An anti terrorism court in Abbottabad sent three accused of gang raping a student in Mansehra on a ten day physical remand on Monday .
The accused were presented before the anti terrorism court today where the bench granted physical remand of the accused for ten days to the police .
The culprits have already confessed to the crime in the judicial magistrate 's court following their arrest .
